item.description:

how i make the mtalk to u when u click him/her

i added this in the dialog
case (npc id):
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, (npcid), 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “(npcname)”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “(text)”, 241, 4);
p.frames.setString(p, “(text)”,241, 5);
break;
